reference.shortdesc: The task element is the top-level element for a task topic. Task topics provide the instructions that guide a user to perform a task.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The OASIS DITA Technical Committee distributes two document-type shells for task topics: general task and strict task.

dlentry.dd: Has a more relaxed content model. It allows section and steps-informal inside of the task body; it also allows multiple instances and varying order for the elements that make up the task body.
Maintains a strict order and cardinality for elements within the taskbody content model. The strict task is implemented with a constraint module.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The task element is specialized from topic. It is defined in the task module.
